content: I show you my stuff with DM Scotty the day has arrived I have finished
AJ's crypt I hope you've all enjoyed the videos that I've made working on the
Crypt I added a lot more than I expected to I added I want to add some more
details to it so since AJ was doing being so patient and I really want to
thank AJ for his patience on this I really want to document it and add some
cool details to it for him so yeah I just really want to thank you AJ for
your patience and that is going out in the mail today so you will see that very
soon and but I wanted to what I want to do was I want to show you all what the
Crypt the finish trip you've seen the bits and pieces but I want to show you
what the finished crypt look like and I think it looks pretty badass so let's go
to the table and I'll show you how that turned out so hey guys I finished up
AJ's dungeon and I want to give you a look at it so here I'll do a little
sweeping move here to show you the first floor and then I'm going to zoom in to
do some details now that we have the entrance here so I did a video on this
and this is a the entrance the sandstone entrance to the characters come in and
then there's a short cave that leads into the crypt and we have the
transition between the cave and the battle crypt itself with a strange room
there and as we move in we see the some a couple of alcoves that I did I've done
a video on that and then we have a strange brackish black well that I was
think it could be a cool trap so I made a kind of oily thing that could pop out
of the well it's similar to the Gorgon mud I did but not quite the same thing
I added some longer tendrils on it so I think it's pretty cool and we'll remove
that so then you move on and we have two doors I did did the door video I'll try
to zoom in here and show you both doors so we got two
rooms from the both doors and then the hall goes further on and that leads up
the stairs we'll get there in a second so we swing around here we see one room
and I've got one of the brazzers in here there's also a secret door so this
wouldn't be laid down until they discover that secret door that's a
couple larger alcoves and some strange rings then we move over the other side
mirrors this nears the the side over there another stranger in the corner a
couple of alcoves and a strange that strange breezier in there and then we
move down to the hall and there's some more alcoves both secret doors exit to
that hallway there and then there's a circular stairway up so now I'll show
you the second floor this cool crypt now here we have a overview of our second
floor and the stairs coming up and lead into the hallway now this is going to be
over that well that's on the bottom level and I thought it'd be kind of cool
to have a custom kind of trap where the floor opens up and they could actually
fall into the next level and be attacked by that blackish slime in the well so
that would be kind of cool I thought so that could open up and surprise them we
go down the hall here I have the doors either the tech door that I did and the
flesh door and then the flesh room with the pseudo pots coming out of the ground
and then you can move those and put them in when you need to and then we have the
other room with the arcane machine there so I thought that came out really great
looks really cool we move in to the next room and we have that slime going on so
pretty pretty cool then you have the double doors the cool double doors I did
in the video for and then the final room so there we go that's all of AJ's crypt
thought it came out really great and just getting ready to ship it out to him
now so congratulations again AJ and take care you all have fun crafting
any crafters I hope you've enjoyed this episode of the DMS craft make sure to
subscribe and I have tons of other videos as you can see I am the
originator of the 2.5 D method of crafting tiles I also do dirt cheap
terrain from the table if all this intrigues you make sure you check out
all the videos below also join my forum we have lots of great crafters on there
who give advice I have a link above and below and last but not least remember go
forth and craft you
